docs.title: Welcome to OnPoint Documentation
docs.text:
This documentation covers data tables, schema, and BI usage.

👉 Start here: - OnPoint One Table

docs.title: OnPoint One Table Documentation
docs.text: This page describes all available columns in the OnPoint One dataset.

docs.title: 📄 Table Schema
docs.text: Column Type Description date_key DATE The date (YYYY-MM-DD). advertiser_id STRING Unique advertiser identifier. store_id STRING Store ID associated with the event. campaign_id STRING Campaign unique ID. impressions INTEGER Number of ad impressions. clicks INTEGER Number of clicks received. orders INTEGER Number of attributed orders. gmv FLOAT Gross merchandise value. cost FLOAT Total ad spend. roi FLOAT Return on investment (GMV / cost).

docs.title: ▶ Example Query (BigQuery)
docs.text: ``sql SELECT date_key, advertiser_id, campaign_id, impressions, clicks, gmv, roi FROMproject.dataset.onpoint_one` WHERE date_key >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
